website_summaries.verdict: These tasty treats are a favorite among smaller dogs, but your larger dogs may love them as well.
pros: Contains chicken for some extra flavor
Satisfying for small and large dogs
Resealable bag keeps the treats fresh
Users are pleased with how much chicken is on these rawhides compared to some competitors
cons: Treats are made in China, however an independent lab in the U.S. tests every batch

customer_reviews.title: SO Much Better than Cadet and Other Brands
customer_reviews.text: So much better than Cadet brand. -- Kingdom Pets has a very generous thick layer of meat around each stick! Not a paper thin layer of meat like Cadet and other brands. No fillers like Amazon's Solimo brand. You are getting the real deal here at a great price, with no unhealthy additives that the other companies use. We are going with Kingdom Pets from here on out only! They really do provide PREMIUM products!
customer_reviews.author: Hotcha

customer_reviews.title: The best dog chew you can find
customer_reviews.text: I just looked at my Amazon history and saw that we have purchased this brand and type of chew stick 33 times since January 2016. I refuse to buy any other brand. They may seem pricy, but the bag is huge, lasts a long time, and is a better deal than the little bags you get at the grocery or pet store. They are super meaty - each stick is loaded with jerky. Our fur baby loves these! If I could give these 10 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Good amount of chicken
customer_reviews.text: My terrier absolutely loves these. They have a decent amount of chicken on them compared to other brands & it always looks fresh. This is a good thing seeing she only wants to eat the chicken part most of the time, but won't eat plain jerky, lol... I guess she likes it served on a stick! She's an older dog with digestive issues and does just fine with these, and the chicken comes off fairly easily so it's not too hard on her teeth. When she does eat the rawhide, it keeps her busy for a good 15-20 minutes, but a large dog would get through it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Sized for Small Breeds
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahuas love these. My funny little Japanese chin eats the chicken wrap off and leaves the rawhide part....cute. And my Maltese love them too. They are all very fond of the duck jerky and duck wrapped sweet potatoes. These last them longer and give them something to do. The package shows a large dog, but I don't think these would be large enough for the bigger dogs. Update: The Chin has taught the Chis to leave the rawhide part.....woe is me. But the Maltese, who live in a different part of the house are still eating the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Neem

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these chew sticks!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! She doesn't eat the entire thing, but just loves the chicken that's wrapped around it. That's fine with me. I'd rather she didn't eat the beef rawhide part. It's not the best treat for a tiny dog. She LOVES the chicken and that's what counts! I'll definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kay Docherty

customer_reviews.title: My puppy will eat the whole bag
customer_reviews.text: My little Nikki (rat terrier) loves both the jerky wraps and the Duck Jerky. Everyday at 4:00 (happy hour) she finds me and reminds me it's time for a treat or 4, then I have to give her the "NO" word until after supper, a couple more after dinner while she watches TV with us. She has us trained well. So we'll keep ordering them until Kingdom runs out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis S.

customer_reviews.title: I WILL NOT ORDER ANYMORE..this picture shows it all
customer_reviews.text: I have never had to post a picture on Amazon reviews but this needs to be seen , the rawhides are actually even thinner than what you you see..and the turkey has been cut in half..I have been buying these for a year almost every month so I thought I would give them the benefit of doubt on one bad bag..well here we go again another chinsey bag..im not wasting my money again...I will order from another company I tried when this company was out of stock ! Hope this was helpful .
customer_reviews.author: Avanator88

customer_reviews.title: CHARLEY LOVES THEM!
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell loves these treats. He eats the chicken crust off, then chows down on the rawhide. He is a big boy so he can eat a treat in no time. These take a little longer and he gets good friction off them to help keep his teeth white and clean. Also if we have to leave to go somewhere, it calms him when give him a treat as we walk out the door. I just hope the makers are able to continue pricing them reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: S DeTar

customer_reviews.title: Pampered pooch stamp of approval
customer_reviews.text: The chicken wrapped rawhide treats are not all created equal, some have so little chicken that it's almost false advertising to claim they have any at all. Thankfully that's not the case with this brand, what you see it what you'll get, the treats have as much or more chicken than the advertisement photo. Most importantly, our picky poodle loves them and isn't begging for a 2nd treat just to get enough chicken to feel as if he's gotten his treat.
customer_reviews.author: hrstar

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands, but these are his favorite. He loves the chicken jerky around the stick. I've never gotten a bad batch, they are always fresh and he enjoys them. I would recommend these to small dog owners for hours of chewing enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: N. Schleif

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed .. Made in China but my dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: My veterinarian suggested I stop feeding any treats coming from China. There is a good chance their factories are not regulated the way we do in the United States. If you're not worried about it, my dogs loved them .. I have three very finicky dogs when it comes to treats.
customer_reviews.author: JennyPMC

customer_reviews.title: Cooper Loves This
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my dog some time ago, and continue to buy it as he loves it. It's a good treat to give him, because he is excited to get it whenever it is offered. I recommend this product for any dog that likes to chew.
customer_reviews.author: A. Couts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chews
customer_reviews.text: Theses chews are great. My dogs love them and you get a lot of chews at a great price. Delivery is quick. No waiting for the product.
customer_reviews.author: jennyg

customer_reviews.title: This has nothing to do with what I liked the most
customer_reviews.text: This has nothing to do with what I liked the most! My little dog, only likes to eat the chicken...my big dog, loves both the chicken and the rawhide! Little, eats the chicken and leaves the rawhide for the big. The, shoe chewing, issue with my big dog adoptee has been resolved. I will buy again! Compared to the one's found in the stores, this is a superior product. I bought a product that I assumed would last a month or be rejected and sit in the pantry for months like all the others....it was gone, gone, gone within 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Worl

customer_reviews.title: These treats are AMAZING! Even my most stubborn 4lb Chihuahua gobbles these ...
customer_reviews.text: These treats are AMAZING! Even my most stubborn 4lb Chihuahua gobbles these things up. I think it is the jerky wrapping that gets him excited and then by that point he devours the entire bone. Keeps him entertained for a half hour or so and he is not much of a chewer. My other dog, a 16lb Chiweenie, is able to chow through these in under 5 minutes but that does not surprise me as he can chew through anything in a matter of minutes. Great product and a great price! If the dogs are happy then I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Slagerman

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love Kingdom chicken chews! They are our go to special treat after dinner. The dogs wait not so patiently for their after dinner treat!
customer_reviews.author: S. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Stitch loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's dog "Stitch" doesn't like dog food, but he sure loves his Kingdom treats! Although he's not to crazy about the delivery driver, he knows there is something for him the package.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: My Chihuahuas would mug a Pitbull for these!
customer_reviews.text: The "joys" of THREE chihuahuas is, two like a certain kind of treat, but the third would not. Now all the chaos is under control, as all three LOVE these! Be prepared to keep extra on hand, because if you run out - you will feel the wrath (like I have} of three ticked-off Chihuahuas standing on your chest all night long demanding a bed-time treat of these. Another plus is, their teeth are spotlessly clean from the aggressive chewing of these treats (no spit out and ignored treats here!),
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: We bought these because our pets love the ones from Meijer that look just like these
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because our pets love the ones from Meijer that look just like these. These look like better quality, not as thin and more chicken. I was hesitant to buy them again after noticing they were made in China, but our dogs love them and have not gotten sick.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey

customer_reviews.title: Best product at best price
customer_reviews.text: My darling doggie passed away Friday the 13th of January - at age 18. Towards the end, these rawhide chews were his only enjoyment in life. For years, they were the only snacks he would ever want after a meal or a long walk. Similar products had much less jerky and did not interest him at all. So thank you, Kingdom Pets, for brightening hundreds of days for my precious Albie.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ro

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs LOVE these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can hardly keep this in the house. My dogs love these bones. We call the "Bonies" and that's all you have to say to get them to come running.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: our dog loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Package is very FULL...our dog savored eating these in stages...first the chicken wrap, then the stick!
customer_reviews.author: rogue10

customer_reviews.title: MY THREE DOGS LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I was use to buying those small packages of this type of treat at $3 for aprox. quantity of 10, you can emagin the cost. I go through one bag of these every week and having Prime I pay nothing for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Grensky

customer_reviews.title: Great product; wish it was made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: My dog can't get enough of these. I wish they were made in America but she's so picky that I just sort of hold my nose and order them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like them
customer_reviews.text: We like that our dogs are crazy about these jerky wraps. We wish that they were made in the USA, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I buy this brand a lot because it is safe and made in the USA You need to be cautious with your pets chew treat and these store well and have a fresh packet so they stay fresh in the zip bag
customer_reviews.author: Reading Renee

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love these treats!!
customer_reviews.text: these are very similar to the rawhides i buy from target which was the only retailer to have them until amazon. target sells them in a 45 count package for about ten dollars. i think the value is about the same after taking into account tax, gas, time, etc., and my dogs can't tell the difference. my dogs looooove them and it keeps them occupied for several minutes. i'll continue to buy them from both retailers so i'll never be out of stock!!
customer_reviews.author: boomer sooner

customer_reviews.title: Our dog just loves these treats.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog just loves these treats. They have chicken wrapped around the rawhide strip. The amount of chicken jerky on each strip is 4 to 5 times as much on the closet competitor we can find. I know when we give these to our Jack Russel she goes through them in 30 to forty minutes. The rawhide is tough enough she has to work for it and help keep her teeth clean. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I like the brand but -- doesn't offer a discount we get under subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased close to 40 bags of this product, but I have been trying Hillside Farms since it can be purchased with a discount under our subscription and this product is not available under subscription and every penny counts these days.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Werner

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I buy these regularly because my dog just love them! Always great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nature's Best

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. My dog will perform a variety of tricks for this special delight.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia S Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great treat your babies will love.
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my babies and they love it. compared to what we find in the stores this is better by a mile, both cost, and portion. My yorkies Kensi and Dash love them. I buy this twice a month at least. I only wish Amazon had this where you can have it on recurring purchase automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Smith

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived timely. My dog loves them. I wish they were less expensive because my dog goes through these quickly but the chicken wrapped chews are not cheap regardless of brand. My dog will be crying at me and he is wanting the chewy. Thanks Kingdom Pets for making a great chewy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite treat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought something similar at a big box store around the holidays, my dog enjoyed them. Ordered these, and he LOVES them. Roots around in my purse, in the bag, any way he can to get more. There's a lot of jerky wrapped around the rawhide and it looks like much better quality than the ones I bought at the big box store. My dog is a 65 lb Aussie who is an old rescue and has few teeth, and it takes him about 5 minutes to get through these. Not long lasting for heavy chewers, but perfect for my old man!
customer_reviews.author: Carly H.

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, I have ordered these and every time I get them they are stale. I bought my last bag a week ago, stale again. No more will I buy.
customer_reviews.author: RoseyCheeks

customer_reviews.title: The Gourmet Dog Treat
customer_reviews.text: I personally haven't tried them! But Anabel, our 4 lb. Tea-Cup Poodle, starts jumping up and down, running around and barking. She basically becomes delirious when she sees THE bone! I really recommend them. Thanks, sbh.l
customer_reviews.author: smile be happy

customer_reviews.title: DOG'S LIKED
customer_reviews.text: THEY HAD A LOT OF CHICKEN ON THEM AND MY DOGS ONLY EAT THE CHICKEN. SO THAT'S IMPORTANT.
customer_reviews.author: TINA LOWE

customer_reviews.title: Good price, quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! I have to keep her to 4 a day, but she keeps staring at the bag! Great treat
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Quality
customer_reviews.text: He likes them. A quality item I have been buying for years. They asked for a review, 1 gave all 5 stars. I have bought from others that were not good. You guys happy? I spent a ton of money....how about you send us a few free bags???
customer_reviews.author: vincent cervone

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for a small dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these he eats all the chicken off and leaves the rawhide
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars from the doggies
customer_reviews.text: Our furry children absolutely love these chews. Never a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Dogs go nuts.....
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go thru these like crazy. They don't eat the Rawhide at first which is ok with me, but love the chicken. These have a nice amount of Chicken on them too. I have tried others but these are their favorite.
customer_reviews.author: kkatdr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!!
customer_reviews.text: Ellington seems to like these for a special treat. good price, quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: NCB

customer_reviews.title: You dog will love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They are wrapped with a LOT of chicken jerky, which she stips off first, and then chews the rawhide. Got some for my friend's dog, who is older and was having a hard time with rawhide chips/strips, but she, too loves these and has no problem chewing them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good, plenty of chicken wrapping
customer_reviews.text: This is a true review! I’ve been purchasing these treats for my two dogs for more than a year. Each one of the small rawhides are generously wrapped in dried chicken. My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: Glitterbug1010

customer_reviews.title: Probably as close to a canine addiction as any delicious treat could get and they are good for them
customer_reviews.text: My three rescues would learn to dance if that was the only way they would get rewarded for these sticks. Probably as close to a canine addiction as any delicious treat could get and they are good for them. I will always have them on hand or face the consequences for not having them. Good product at a good price and quick to be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and we strongly recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Our Veterinarian Tech gave a couple of these to try..........saying that her Jack Russel loves them so............we tried them with our Cairn Terrier and he loves them also!!!!! They're a very healthy treat/chew to help keep his teeth clean in a safe manner. Very good product and we strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Joehorse

customer_reviews.title: my 3 dogs love,love,love it
customer_reviews.text: my 3 dogs love,love,love it. I have 2 large, and one small dogs, and they can't get enough of it. I only gave a 4 star, because, my one large dog devours it within 3 minutes,then barks at the other dogs for not sharing. I end up having to sneak another to him (I have to sneak or the other dogs, despite them already having one, wants another), just to shut him up. I definitely would recommend it to dog owners.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Not enough jerky
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot in the bag but the amount of jerky attached to the rawhide stick is minimal, there are better choices.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Love these feel like they are safer for my babies
customer_reviews.text: Love these feel like they are safer for my babies. Order all the time but so $$$. I asked about bulk purchasing and did not receive answer
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Worthy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Favorite Treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats. He would do anything to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these for a long time now., Dogs bed time treats. They bug me to go to bed so they can get one. But this last bag they were so thin and not much on them they want more. They finish eating before I get into my bed! Expensive treat to be cheating your customers on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have two dogs that have separation anxiety and if they get one of these before I go they do good. My puppy runs into the area
customer_reviews.text: I buy these all the time for my dogs. I have two dogs that have separation anxiety and if they get one of these before I go they do good. My puppy runs into the area I baby gate him into to get one. When I first got him I had to chase him everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves this product.
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this product. In fact these are his "chew of choice". I like the fact that you can actually see the chicken unlike many other chicken covered chews where the chicken is so small or skimpy. Kingdom Pets are a super treat for our active chewer and a super value to boot.
customer_reviews.author: spudmcc

customer_reviews.title: No tummy ache!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brand over some others! The rawhide seems to be easier to digest. Generous amount of jerky! Pleased
customer_reviews.author: D. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: A treat for all day for my Min Pins
customer_reviews.text: My two Min Pins love these treats. They enjoy the chicken quickly and then enjoy the stick for the rest of the day. One of them will carry the stick from the end, looking like he is carrying a cigar, around the house before devouring it. We will get more of these
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: Great product...my bloodhounds love them, and my basset hound too! Good quality, and good value size bag.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CHICKEN WRAPPED RAW-HIDE STICKS AROUND
customer_reviews.text: THESE STICKS HAVE MORE MEAT ON EACH RAW-HIDE THAN ANY OTHER BRAND, WHICH MAKE THEM A GREAT VALUE TREAT FOR YOUR PET(S)....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great. My guy only eats these when he's out ...
customer_reviews.text: Not so great. My guy only eats these when he's out of the ones I get from the groomer that have much more meat wrapped around them. One of these sticks will lay around for a week until he gets bored and chews it. You get a great quantity for the price, but the product is so so.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Good Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love chicken wrapped rawhide treats and they have become so hard to find that I was pleased to find these. They do not have as much chicken as the old ones but the dogs don't seem to notice. I will continue to buy them as long as I can't find the old brand. It was a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Just Grrrreat.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for our pets. Dogs will obey when they hear the the treat bag. Give the baby's something that is good for them. Super fast shipping. Thanks and will redo. AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.author: ARTHUR CASTILLO

customer_reviews.title: Best Rawhide Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other rawhide products with chicken wrapped around it, but my dogs have never enjoyed any as much as they enjoy these. I don't know if the company sprinkles crack in the chicken/rawhide, but my dogs can't get enough of them. After trying this product, I will never go back to the various rawhide products I used before.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love them!! There is a lot more chicken jerky on them than the ones I have bought from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: autyde

customer_reviews.title: A winner with my Beagles
customer_reviews.text: My Beagles love these. The rawhide helps to keep their teeth cleaner, and they love the chicken. These are one of their favorite treats, and they get about 20 minutes of chewing pleasure with each. I give them only one per day, as it's not good to give them too much rawhide.
customer_reviews.author: P. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: the dogs love them, so what can I say
customer_reviews.text: the dogs love them, so what can I say. they like the chicken part the best. sometimes they chew the rawhide, sometimes not.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Grimaldo

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Right after I ordered them, of course, and my dogs show how much they enjoy them these too were recalled. I'm on the list for when they will be back again but as you all know this is where our money goes trying to find something else they like. Hopefully they will be back soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ray MacMeeken

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs vomit after 1st chewing.  made in chins.  don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: These made my dogs vomit after eating the first time. Found they're made in China and not returnable. In the trash and waste of money. Don't feed if your concerned about your dog's health.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Making my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My dogs luv these ! Don’t know if I got a bad batch - one of my dogs is sick now after eating.. so not giving to them anymore
customer_reviews.author: NewReaderInTexas

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats! They have been her absolute favorite treat for about three years now - she does not get tired of them like she does with some other snacks. And this brand has a generous amount of chicken wrapped on the rawhide stick, which she loves even more. Like a chicken lollipop!
customer_reviews.author: PPW

customer_reviews.title: Good sticks with good amount of chicken
customer_reviews.text: Compared these to the Cadet brand and very much like these better as they have much more chicken on the sticks. Will continue buying these as they are a good (and at this point, preferred) alternative to other options, including what Target offers.
customer_reviews.author: energyguy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They are a great size, small enough for the smallest dog but substantial enough for the larger ones. I foster for a local Humane Society group and have various sized of dogs at any one time. They have all loved these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customercrr

customer_reviews.title: My dog is picky and loves these. She is ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky and loves these. She is a large boxer and will chew on these without hesitation. They last about 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog really loved these and surprising, they lasted for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pros 'n Cons
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 rescue dogs and these treats are a daily staple. They all love the chicken, then go after the rawhide for nice clean teeth. Downside: These , and other such treats are getting more scarce, and therefore I have noticed the price to jump about 67% from 5 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ratto

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog and a puppy,and they BOTH go crazy for these treats!The older dog took awhile to willingly chew the whole treat,due to her age-related dental issues,but after about 1 month,she is now tackling ALL of her daily treat!
customer_reviews.author: SunLover

customer_reviews.title: So fresh!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs adore these!!!! They are fresh and my dogs are happy to get their “cigar” which is our nickname for them. We order 1-2x per month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to give to give to distract him when I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! Great to give to give to distract him when I'm leaving the house or trying to eat dinner in peace.
customer_reviews.author: lamargaritaloca7

customer_reviews.title: Jackpot!
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I bought it because the one I usually buy is not available and fortunately Amazon suggested this brand that my pets like better than the other one, lucky me and my pets!
customer_reviews.author: alberto r.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: The dogs pull off the wrap of jerky to eat that first, then go back and chew the rawhide. They stand by the cabinet after their evening walk and insist on getting these chews. Heaven help me if I would ever run out!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best chicken wrapped rawhide in town. Great price, very meaty wraps, but not always available which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Pets favorite Jerky Wraps
customer_reviews.text: These jerky wraps are better quality than I tried in the past, as they are staying on the bone without crumbling. My dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcey

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, but listed on Amazon as made in USA
customer_reviews.text: I let my miniature poodles have about 3 treats each over 3 days. Then I read that they were from China. I will not press my luck regardless of what the Kingdom Pets website says. My dogs didn't get sick, but I won't chance it.Now I am Leary of buying anything for my pets unless I see the photo of the product that says made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Aboud

customer_reviews.title: My dog will eat NO other Chew Sticks
customer_reviews.text: These rawhide jerky wraps are great because they have a lot of jerky on them and I can easily pull the jerky off. Some chews like this give you so little chicken and it's so hard to get off, like it has been glued on but these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Scarpati

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs can't get enough of these. I once left a bag on the floor open , by mistake and I caught them taking them out of the bag one by one and chewing them up like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: nikniknikole

customer_reviews.title: My dog Bebe does not like cookies or biscuits
customer_reviews.text: My dog Bebe does not like cookies or biscuits. He however loves these jerky wraps. He saves the bones and eats them at his leisure. We can't keep the bag very long. Every time we order one, he runs around, barks and demands one right away. Best investment ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bowman

customer_reviews.title: I started to buy these before the big scare and because the are inspected and tested here I continue to buy them and she eats th
customer_reviews.text: These are state side inspected, I started to buy these before the big scare and because the are inspected and tested here I continue to buy them and she eats them like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: My little dog loved them - produced in USA
customer_reviews.text: I worry about products from overseas. I bought this because they were produced in the US. My little dog is picky, but she loved these. Took months to receive them because they were not in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Yummie
customer_reviews.text: As I have said month after month our 12 year old standard poodle loves these. She has been eating them for years and has never had a problem. Sometimes she eats the whole stick, sometimes she just eats the chicken off.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robert W. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: There not easy to find
customer_reviews.text: The dog love them, but they are hard to find. They were pulled for a time, because they have an antibiotic that was not approved by the FDA. If it was a different additive I wont give it to my dog. But an antibiotic is a different matter.
customer_reviews.author: CONNORS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these but rarely eat the rawhide stick.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Two happy dogs with these treats
customer_reviews.text: Two happy dogs with these treats. Plenty to chew,and occupy them. The chicken is plentiful,free of dyes,other ingredients you can't identify or pronounce. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: c. olsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are picky and though this is not their usual brand they didn't complain even once 😜
customer_reviews.author: Mo-knows

customer_reviews.title: Very HIgh Quality Doggie treat!
customer_reviews.text: My little Yorkie, absolutely LOVES these high-quality Natural Rawhide treats! I LOVE how LARGE the bag is! IT's GREAT - 1 bag a month! And I have a VERY VERY happy "Best-Friend!" (PAWS UP!)
customer_reviews.author: keri west

customer_reviews.title: Great price , excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These treats are always fresh and loaded with chicken. My dogs get really excited every time I get a box from Amazon. I have tried many other brands but these are superior to any other products I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love
customer_reviews.text: Will probably order these regularly. I've gotten them twice... My dogs love them
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these but...
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these! However I've read some recent reviews and these are not made in USA and I'm not sure if I would buy them again....
customer_reviews.author: y. chang

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Treat
customer_reviews.text: I have four dogs and they love them. All I have to say is, " Do you want a treat treat?" and all eyes are on me as they wait for the pantry door to open!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cookus

customer_reviews.title: The Kingdom chicken wrapped rawhides they seemed to like but I realized after purchasing them that they were ...
customer_reviews.text: The Kingdom chicken wrapped rawhides they seemed to like but I realized after purchasing them that they were made in China, so I won'but them again. I purchased another brand made in the USA. I worry about anything not made in this country.
customer_reviews.author: nancy harges

customer_reviews.title: My Cocker Spaniels LOVE them!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the Pet Smart Brand ?. The Kingdom Pets brand seem to have a little less chicken on the bone, but dogs did not seem to notice. I would purchase again because the Amazon product is less expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: Furman Walter

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time i purchase this. My puppy loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time i purchase this. My puppy loves it. However, make sure you put it in a ziplock bag or some sort. I didn't close the bag well enough one night and there was ants ALL over it.
customer_reviews.author: chen

product_meta.title: Kingdom Pets Chicken and Rawhide Jerky Wraps
product_meta.description: Size:16 ozWe love dogs as much as you do, so we put that love into creating a safe and healthy treat you can feel good about giving to your four-legged friend. Kingdom Pets all-natural jerky is a great alternative to bones and rawhide; your dog gets the chewy texture they love without the heightened fear of choking. Free from artificial colors, flavorings, and fillers, our jerky dog treats will make a great addition to your dog's balanced diet. Our technique of oven drying wholesome chicken and rawhide intensifies their naturally delicious flavor - so no worries about a bland treat here. Your pet will savor the flavor and beg for more.
feature_bullets: FREE FROM FILLERS: All of our protein-packed treats are free from grain, soy, and corn. Your pup can savor the natural, rich flavor of farm-raised chicken and sweet potatoes without any fillers.

LOVED BY DOGS OF ALL SIZES: Dogs of all sizes and breeds can enjoy our tasty treats. Easy-to-break jerky can be customized into small pieces for smaller pets or remain full-sized for large four-legged friends.

LIMITED INGREDIENTS: Treats with limited ingredients decrease the likelihood of allergic reactions for dogs with allergies and food sensitivities. Eliminating additives supports healthy digestion and disruptions in the endocrine system.

SWEET REWARD: Dehydrated to lock in flavor and nutrients, our high high quality jerky is the perfect healthy training treat. Just break them into bite-sized pieces, and your pet will be sitting pretty for their favorite snack.
